definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
to die (idiom)/to breathe one's last/to give up the ghost

sentences.english: The gun was pointing at Hoo-Woo.
A car whined in protest, but skidded staunchly out of its driveway.
sentences.chinese: 有辆小汽车呜隆隆响着，好不容易蹒跚驶出马路。

sentences.english: Oxen lowing, little knowing Christ the Babe is Lord of all.
sentences.chinese: 牛群呜叫，不知道基督圣婴是万有主。

sentences.english: Vroom! A sports car roared past.
sentences.chinese: 呜的一声，一辆跑车疾驶而过。

sentences.english: I bought lollipops and a toot-toot bugle .
sentences.chinese: 我给她买了棒棒糖，一吹就呜的打响的小喇叭。

sentences.english: Other gull, a few acoustic Wu cries, awakened me and all of the memories.
sentences.chinese: 彼岸鸥鸟，几声呜啼，惊醒了我所有的记忆。

sentences.english: Hoo - Woo ran out of the trees to meet me.
sentences.chinese: “呼呜”从树林里跑出来迎接我。

sentences.english: Oompa loompas don't sing in heaven. They tidy up the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 呜吧鲁吧不会在天堂唱歌，它们在清理云彩。

sentences.english: The dog whimpered in the corner.
I take a burner , and I burn away this thread.
sentences.chinese: 我用一个打火机，呜，我烧断了线。

sentences.english: The birds were trilling in the trees.

sentences.chinese: 火车呜的一声飞驰而过。

sentences.english: The next day, he gathered his army and advanced to the rolling of his drums.

definition: hiss/neigh/Ss! (sound of air sucked between the teeth, indicating hesitation or thinking over)
(onom.) to squeak (of mice)/to chirp or peep (of small birds)
(of animals, the wind etc) to make a mournful sound/whine/moan/wail
(onom.) for the sound of a bird, an empty stomach etc
